extendedInfo.description: Get Divya Bhaskar now for your Android. Read news on the move, anytime, anywhere. Get top stories, your city news, Entertainment, Cricket and much more in Gujarati. Reading news of your choice was never so easy and enjoyable!!! Whats to offer:â¢ News in Gujaratiâ¢ Top News, local City news, entertainment, sports and recent stories from all sections. â¢ Cricket ball by ball updates â¢ Latest Events and top celebs photographs from around the world. â¢ Easy 1 click access to information. â¢ Share whatever you read and let your friends know your opinions by sharing the stories on facebook, twitter or by email. Want to send feedback or suggestions? logon to: www.divyabhaskar.com. Your feedback is valuable and help us in improving our services.ABOUT US i media corp ltd. (IMCL) is a subsidiary of DB Corp ltd. providing integrated internet and mobile interactive services. The company has in its gamut the Dainik Bhaskar and Divya Bhaskar wapsites and websites. Also english website called Daily Bhaskar.The company also has under its umbrella the mobile shortcode ' 54567 '.Terms and Conditions: Divya Bhaskar value the privacy of information pertaining to its associates. We do not use or disclose information about your individual visits to our portal or information that you may give us, such as your name, address, email address or telephone number, to any outside sources. We will not use information about you without your permission and will provide the means for you to manage and control the information that you have provided. We will enable you to communicate your privacy concerns to us and that we will respond to them appropriately. We do not disclose any personal information to advertisers and for other marketing and promotional purposes that could be used to personally identify you, such as your password, credit card number and bank account number. The credit card transaction information is protected by the industry standard Secure Socket Layer (SSL).In case of any concern about your privacy, please write to us, we will respond to you immediately.If you don't agree with any of our disclaimers above please do not read the material on any of our pages.

reviews.title: a needful suggestion
reviews.comment: You need to update this application. so many people in countries other than india love to read divyabhaskar but because of the lack of the content in the app they could not read. My sincere suggestion is you guys should check out the sandesh newspaper app they have the supplement papers in jpeg images and you can also read then offline.. Please do something!!!
reviews.author: shivani dave

reviews.title: App is quite OK but making fool
reviews.comment: At the end of every page they write click Next for picture nd more news but there is no sucking photo or a single picture.....

reviews.title: Can\'t browse page..
reviews.comment: Headings fonts does not compile sentence. Only few word appear. Major set back of this app is in reading reading news there is no option to browse page.. If you try to turn next page than complete news will change!!!.
